24.content: Analyze Volunteer Management System benefits for ISSB Portal
24.details: Review the detailed technical specification and identify key enhancements over current volunteer system. Focus on benefits for single $360/year membership model.

25.content: Design integrated volunteer system database schema
25.details: Create volunteer_opportunities, volunteer_assignments tables that INTEGRATE with existing volunteer_hours table. No duplication - enhance the current system.

26.content: Develop migration path for existing volunteer hours
26.details: Create migration plan to convert existing volunteer_hours entries to new opportunities-based system. Ensure no duplicate data.

27.details: Create edge functions that provide opportunities AND enhanced hour logging. Replace existing volunteer functions, not add to them.

28.details: Replace current volunteer pages with enhanced opportunities-based interface. Single volunteer dashboard, not multiple systems.
